context: National telecom provider with 40% market share facing competitive pressure from 5G network deployments

request.purpose: Accelerate 5G network expansion to cover 70% of population within 24 months
request.justification: Competitors launching 5G services; current 4G network at capacity in urban areas; projected 300% data usage increase by 2026

decision_process.outcome: Confirmed strategic necessity for accelerated 5G deployment
Feasible with existing spectrum holdings and vendor partnerships
Projected 15% IRR with $200M annual revenue increase

business_impact.expected_outcome: Market leadership in 5G services, improved network capacity, enhanced customer experience, new revenue streams

lessons_learned: Early regulatory engagement critical for telecom infrastructure projects; phased rollout reduces execution risk while maintaining competitive pressure
